hero.heading: BEYOND LUXURY. SINCE 1940.
hero.subheading: From Barcelona to the world. VIP services with over 80 years of legacy.
hero.backgroundAlt: Luxury limousine on Passeig de Gr√†cia

legacy.heading: A legacy of excellence since 1940
legacy.subheading: More than eight decades of exclusive service throughout Spain.

tradition.title: Tradition & Luxury
tradition.description: We merge the heritage of classic service with modern innovation and comfort.

fleet.title: Exclusive Fleet
fleet.description: High-end vehicles, from executive sedans to luxury limousines and vans.

discretion.title: Discretion Guaranteed
discretion.description: Privacy and confidentiality are pillars of our five-star service.

detail.title: Attention to Detail
detail.description: Each journey is a unique experience, meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations.

punctuality.title: Swiss Punctuality
punctuality.description: Total commitment to your time. Always arrive at your destination with elegance and no rush.

personalized.title: Personalized Service
personalized.description: We adapt to your needs. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

hero.title: Over 80 years of excellence on wheels
hero.subtitle: Pioneers in chauffeured vehicle rental in Spain since 1940.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Since 1940, Dachs Limousines has set the standard for exclusive transportation in Spain.
history.paragraph2: As one of the pioneering companies in chauffeured car rental in Barcelona, we have accompanied generations of clients with an unwavering commitment to punctuality, elegance, and comfort.
history.paragraph3: Our fleet ranges from executive sedans to luxurious limousines, vans, minibuses, and coaches, all equipped to meet the expectations of those who demand the best.
history.paragraph4: Every detail has been meticulously cared for. With highly trained multilingual drivers, offering more than just a journey: a frictionless experience, with style and discretion.

cta.title: Ready to experience the next level of luxury transport?

aiConcierge.greeting: Welcome to Dachs Limousines. How can I assist you with your exclusive experience?
aiConcierge.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
aiConcierge.offerContact: If you wish, I can help arrange for our team to contact you for more personalized attention.

hero.subtitle: We will be delighted to help you plan an unforgettable journey

hero.title: Book your exclusive experience
hero.subtitle: Choose a date and one of our advisors will contact you to design a tailor-made service.

calendar.title: Select your Date

availability.success: Thank you. We have received your request for {city} on {date} for {pax} person(s). One of our advisors will contact you shortly to confirm availability and details.

hero.title: High-level mobility solutions for companies and events
hero.subtitle: Trust Dachs Limousines for premium transfers at congresses, weddings, corporate trips, and group logistics.

leadersSection.title: Leaders in premium mobility since 1940
leadersSection.paragraph1: At Dachs Limousines, we have been serving companies, institutions, and demanding clients for over 80 years.
leadersSection.paragraph2: Our experience allows us to offer complete premium mobility solutions: from individual transfers to comprehensive logistics for events with hundreds of attendees, always guaranteeing punctuality, discretion, and maximum comfort.

services.heading: Services Designed for the Success of Your Event

corporate.title: Corporate Transfers
corporate.description: Airport, station, and hotel pick-ups for executives. Maximum punctuality and discretion.

weddings.title: Dream Weddings
weddings.description: Luxury limousines and vehicles for the bride, groom, and guests. A touch of distinction for your big day.

congresses.title: Congresses and Fairs
congresses.description: Transport logistics for large-scale events. Coordination and multilingual attention.

vipTourism.title: VIP Tourism
vipTourism.description: Private excursions and personalized tours with expert chauffeurs in Barcelona and surroundings.

benefits.heading: A premium fleet, an impeccable experience
benefits.fleet: High-end Mercedes fleet and similar, with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and maximum discretion.
benefits.drivers: Professional, uniformed drivers, with languages and experience in protocolary treatment.
benefits.organization: Comprehensive organization of transfers for groups, corporate events, and MICE.
benefits.budgets: Adaptation to all types of clients and budgets, from one-off services to annual contracts.
benefits.attention: Quick quotes and personalized 24/7 attention for companies and agencies.
benefits.activeFor: Active service for companies, travel agencies, PCOs, hotels, production companies, and wedding planners.

finalCta.title: Organizing an event or need luxury executive mobility?
